title: Discarding Like Pieces

references.title: http://cm.bell-labs.com/cm/cs/who/ken/chesseg.html. 6-man EGTs, maximal positions, maximal mutual zugzwangs and endgame statistics.

abstract: The guideline of ‘discarding like men’ to estimate the merit of a chess position is well known. This note compares it with some statistics
